summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6275 for the improvement of Montlake Boulevard Northeast from Northeast 45th St. to approximately 3,700 feet southerly thereof; and a certain other avenue; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 91829, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
